meanings.definition: A group of people summoned for jury duty.
meanings.sent1: The venire was selected randomly from the community.
meanings.sent2: The judge explained the importance of the venire in the legal process.
meanings.sent3: The venire members joked about forming a jury band during the break.
meanings.sent4: The venire resembled a diverse puzzle coming together for justice.
meanings.sent5: The venire's responsibility is crucial for a fair trial.

meanings.sent1: I will venire to the party as soon as I finish my homework.
meanings.sent2: The train is expected to venire at the station in ten minutes.
meanings.sent3: The pizza delivery guy always manages to venire right on time.
meanings.sent4: The sun began to venire over the horizon, signaling the start of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The much-awaited weekend finally started to venire closer.
